summary: SUM,总计; Impression, Click, CTR, Spend, CPC, Order, Sale, Cart, Fav, ROI, CVR, CPU

summary: CONTRAST,对比; Impression, Click, CTR, Spend, CPC, Order, Sale, Cart, Fav, ROI, CVR, CPU

cubes.dimensions: 平台, Impression, Click, CTR, Spend, CPC, Order, Sale, Cart, Fav, ROI, CVR, CPU

cubes.name: 直通车 & 钻展分类表现（PC）
cubes.dimensions: 平台, Impression, Click, CTR, Spend, CPC, Order, Sale, Cart, Fav, ROI, CVR, CPU

cubes.name: simba_client_curr_period
cubes.dimensions: 平台, Date, Impression, Click, CTR, Spend, CPC, Order, Sale, Cart, Fav, ROI, CVR, CPU
mappings: Date;CASE '@@@@@PERIOD@@@@@' WHEN 'WEEK' THEN '本周' WHEN 'MONTH' THEN '本月' WHEN 'QUARTER' THEN '本季度' WHEN 'YEAR' THEN '本年' ELSE '' END
CTR;CASE WHEN impressions>0 THEN ROUND(click / impressions, 4) ELSE 0 END
CPC;CASE WHEN click>0 THEN ROUND(cost / click, 4) ELSE 0 END
ROI;CASE WHEN cost>0 THEN ROUND(pay / cost, 4) ELSE 0 END
CVR;CASE WHEN click>0 THEN ROUND(pay_count / click, 4) ELSE 0 END
CPU;CASE WHEN pay_count>0 THEN ROUND(cost / pay_count, 4) ELSE 0 END

cubes.name: simba_client_last_period
cubes.dimensions: 平台, Date, Impression, Click, CTR, Spend, CPC, Order, Sale, Cart, Fav, ROI, CVR, CPU
mappings: Date;CASE '@@@@@PERIOD@@@@@' WHEN 'WEEK' THEN '上周' WHEN 'MONTH' THEN '上月' WHEN 'QUARTER' THEN '上季度' WHEN 'YEAR' THEN '上年' ELSE '' END
CTR;CASE WHEN impressions>0 THEN ROUND(click / impressions, 4) ELSE 0 END
CPC;CASE WHEN click>0 THEN ROUND(cost / click, 4) ELSE 0 END
ROI;CASE WHEN cost>0 THEN ROUND(pay / cost, 4) ELSE 0 END
CVR;CASE WHEN click>0 THEN ROUND(pay_count / click, 4) ELSE 0 END
CPU;CASE WHEN pay_count>0 THEN ROUND(cost / pay_count, 4) ELSE 0 END

cubes.dimensions: 平台, Impression, Click, CTR, Spend, CPC, Order, Sale, Cart, Fav, ROI, CVR, CPU

cubes.name: simba_product_tmp
cubes.dimensions: 平台, Product, Impression, Click, CTR, Spend, CPC, Order, Sale, Cart, Fav, ROI, CVR, CPU
mappings: CTR;CASE WHEN impressions>0 THEN ROUND(click / impressions, 4) ELSE 0 END
CPC;CASE WHEN click>0 THEN ROUND(cost / click, 4) ELSE 0 END
ROI;CASE WHEN cost>0 THEN ROUND(pay / cost, 4) ELSE 0 END
CVR;CASE WHEN click>0 THEN ROUND(pay_count / click, 4) ELSE 0 END
CPU;CASE WHEN pay_count>0 THEN ROUND(cost / pay_count, 4) ELSE 0 END

cubes.name: simba_product_base
cubes.dimensions: product

cubes.name: 直通车子分类表现
cubes.dimensions: 渠道, DD, Impression, Click, CTR, Spend, CPC, Order, Sale, Cart, Fav, ROI, CVR, CPU
mappings: CTR;CASE WHEN impressions>0 THEN ROUND(click / impressions, 4) ELSE 0 END
CPC;CASE WHEN click>0 THEN ROUND(cost / click, 4) ELSE 0 END
ROI;CASE WHEN cost>0 THEN ROUND(pay / cost, 4) ELSE 0 END
CVR;CASE WHEN click>0 THEN ROUND(pay_count / click, 4) ELSE 0 END
CPU;CASE WHEN pay_count>0 THEN ROUND(cost / pay_count, 4) ELSE 0 END

cubes.name: simba_item_base
cubes.dimensions: item

item: 吸尘器;i.title;REGEXP;.*V6TopDog|V6Car|V6Motorhead|V6Origin|V6Fluffy|V6Fluffy＋|V6Absolute|V8Absolute|V8Fluffy|DC45.*;.*车载吸尘器|圆筒吸尘器.*
